entry.title: 插入排序（Python）
entry.content:
<pre class="prettyprint linenums bush:python" lang="python">#! /usr/bin/env python

coding: utf-8

def insert_sort(arraylist):

for j in range(1, len(arraylist)):
    key = arraylist[j]
    i = j - 1
    while i >= 0 and arraylist[i] > key:
        arraylist[i + 1] = arraylist[i]
        i = i - 1
    arraylist[i + 1] = key

if name == "main":

arr = [2,3,55,31,1,20,44,12,1,99]
print arr
insert_sort(arr)
print arr


只要改变while那句中的arraylist[i] < key即可变成非升序排列
